mapper.sql: Recycle_Order_ID, Address_ID, Collector_Person_ID, Evaluation_ID, User_ID, Scheduled_Time, Finished_Time, Total_Amount
mapper.select: select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r left join user u on r.User_ID=u.User_ID where r.User_ID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r left join user u on r.User_ID=u.User_ID where r.User_ID=#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') AS Scheduled_Time,sum(r.Total_Amount) AS Count from recycle_orders r GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r left join collector c on r.Collector_Person_ID=c.Collector_Person_ID where c.Collector_Person_ID=#{collectorid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') AS Scheduled_Time,COUNT(*) AS Count from recycle_orders r left join collector c on r.Collector_Person_ID=c.Collector_Person_ID where c.Collector_Person_ID=#{collectorid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%H') asc

select distinct DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') AS Scheduled_Time,sum(r.Total_Amount) AS Count from recycle_orders r left join collector c on r.Collector_Person_ID=c.Collector_Person_ID where c.Collector_Person_ID=#{collectorid,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') order by DATE_FORMAT(r.Scheduled_Time,'%Y-%m') asc
select sum(Total_Amount) from recycle_orders where Finished_Time is not null
mapper.insert: insert into recycle_orders (Address_ID, Collector_Person_ID, Evaluation_ID, User_ID, Scheduled_Time, Finished_Time, Total_Amount) values (#{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{evaluationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scheduledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{finishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE})

insert into recycle_orders
Address_ID,

mapper.update:
update recycle_orders
Address_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Collector_Person_ID = #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Evaluation_ID = #{evaluationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
User_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
Scheduled_Time = #{scheduledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Finished_Time = #{finishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Total_Amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
where Recycle_Order_ID = #{recycleOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update recycle_orders set Address_ID = #{addressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Collector_Person_ID = #{collectorPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Evaluation_ID = #{evaluationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, User_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Scheduled_Time = #{scheduledTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Finished_Time = #{finishedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Total_Amount = #{totalAmount,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where Recycle_Order_ID = #{recycleOrderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
